667d9ad36aabce24f999b7204dec2a38 (14:11): i accidently overwrote my mysql database... is there a way i can get the installer to create it again from scratch?
a965fe34034879fe521e2e3ae6552da8 (14:14): is there a big difference (in terms of performance) if two tables which contain same data differ by column types (TEXT vs VARCHAR) ?
6a5738bf18569e3db222f8e2101fcd8a (14:15): hey there. anyone knows how to insert a sql file of create tables and insert values through terminal?
a965fe34034879fe521e2e3ae6552da8 (14:15): mysql -u user existing_db < sql_dump_file
a965fe34034879fe521e2e3ae6552da8 (14:16): this works for me, phpnerd
6a5738bf18569e3db222f8e2101fcd8a (14:16): thanks .. I tried this today but didn't work ... I dunno what's wrong but i'll try again
a965fe34034879fe521e2e3ae6552da8 (14:17): phpnerd: database permissions maybe, broken sql dump
6a5738bf18569e3db222f8e2101fcd8a (14:18): yeah .. I guess it's working now ... it was a permission that I fixed a while ago but never inserted the file afterwards
a965fe34034879fe521e2e3ae6552da8 (14:18): phpnerd: you could try to add a -v to increase verbosity, maybe that would help you to find out the problem
6a5738bf18569e3db222f8e2101fcd8a (14:19): thanks <HowardTheCoward>
ab14bd2ee3f91af24d7bbf48a933b8f9 (14:29): Edward123, yes justdelete the data dir (make a backup of the /etc/my.cnf and delete) and rerun the install script

8a47702c4afcfd1b046f50443856c347 (15:13): i'm planning my backup strategy at the moment on a windows box... just wondering whether it's safe to backup everything in the 'MySQL Datafiles' folder, or is it necessary to mysqldump all the tables too?
0311963ee43c84f5d278b5ff866a7782 (15:13): HowardTheCoward: a bit
0311963ee43c84f5d278b5ff866a7782 (15:14): HowardTheCoward: depends on operation. blob data is usually stored outside of the row
8a47702c4afcfd1b046f50443856c347 (15:14): e.g. if i restored MySQLDatafiles would i get all my data back?
2f2a59bdc16129afab0254f526e56f33 (15:14): domas: I set global create, but when I go to phpmyadmin as that user, it doesn't allow me to crate anything. heh
0311963ee43c84f5d278b5ff866a7782 (15:14): Fastly: if all - yes. but mysqldump is less error-prone
